results.name: Expansion of f(-x^1, -x^7) in powers of x where f(, ) is Ramanujan's general theta function.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
C. G. J. Jacobi, Uber die Zur Numerischen Berechnung Der Elliptischen Funtionen Zweckmassigsten Formeln, in Gesammelte Werke, Bd. I, 1881, pp. 343-368. See p. 347 equ. (7.)
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ x^1, x^8] QPochhammer[ x^7, x^8] QPochhammer[ x^8], {x, 0, n}];
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jun 29 2014
